Module kivakit.resource
Package com.telenav.kivakit.resource.compression.archive

Class FieldArchive

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.broadcasters.Multicaster
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater
com.telenav.kivakit.resource.compression.archive.FieldArchive
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Broadcaster, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Listener, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.MessageTransceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Repeater, com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.Transceiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.io.Closeable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Receiver, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging.Transmitter, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Nameable, com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.NamedObject, AutoCloseable
public class FieldArchive extends com.telenav.kivakit.core.messaging.repeaters.BaseRepeater implements com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.io.Closeable

A field archive serializes data into zip file entries in a ZipArchive. The constructor for this class takes a Resource, which is used to construct the zip archive. FieldArchive only serializes fields that are explicitly labeled with the ArchivedField annotation.

When the fields of an object are saved with saveFieldsOf(ObjectWriter, NamedObject, Version), the object's name via NamedObject.objectName() is used as a prefix for each field that is saved. For example, if an object named "paintbrush" has a field named "width", the entry would be saved as "paintbrush.width" in the archive.

When an entry is read with load(ObjectReader, NamedObject, String), the object's name and the field name will be used again to reconstruct the archive entry name. The methods loadFieldOf(ObjectReader, NamedObject, String) and loadFieldsOf(ObjectReader, NamedObject...) both load object(s) from the archive, but they also set the loaded value into the property with the given field name.

Properties

  • file()
  • mode()
  • progressReporter()
  • version()
  • version(Version)
  • zip()

Loading

  • load(ObjectReader reader, NamedObject, String) - Loads the object with the given object name and field name
  • loadFieldOf(ObjectReader, NamedObject, String) - Loads the named field into the given object
  • loadFieldsOf(ObjectReader, NamedObject...) - Loads all the fields of the given object
  • loadVersion(ObjectReader) - The version of data in this archive

Saving

  • save(ObjectWriter, String, VersionedObject) - Saves the versioned object in the named archive entry
  • saveFieldsOf(ObjectWriter, NamedObject, Version) - Saves all object fields using the given version
  • saveVersion(ObjectWriter, Version) - Sets the version of data in this archive

When objects have been saved or loaded from the archive, close() ensures that output (if any) is flushed and streams are closed.

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
